scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter, written on March 18, 1962, from Robert Penn Warren, Fairfield, Connecticut, to a Mr. Reynolds, defines the ethics of a "writer qua writer" as writing as well as he can, and says that these ethics may "fall foul of his ethics as a man."
